content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task:

Preparing Legal Documents and Maintaining Filing System

1. Affidavit Preparation - Draft affidavits based on information provided by attorneys or clients - Ensure affidavits are properly formatted, notarized, and filed with the court - Maintain copies of all affidavits in the case file 2. Legal Correspondence - Compose letters and emails on behalf of attorneys to clients, opposing counsel, courts, and other parties - Proofread outgoing correspondence for accuracy, clarity, and professionalism - File copies of all correspondence in the appropriate case files 3. Document Organization and Filing - Create and maintain well-organized electronic and physical filing systems - Develop logical and consistent naming conventions for electronic files and folders - Regularly back up important electronic case files - Ensure all case documents are properly labeled and filed in a timely manner - Routinely purge old files in accordance with document retention policies
